In most countries, there are marginalized sectors of the
population where most of the diseases and deaths occur.Usually these people are the poorest, those living in difficultareas not accessible to means of transportation or wherethere is war, or those belonging to cultural minorities.  Onlyspecial strategies will reach these population groups.
